summary: Expose the Upgrade-on-CaN option and ContinueAsNewSuggestedReasons API to enable trampolining and upgrade-on-CaN support in the Go SDK.
userImpact: Users cannot leverage upgrade-on-CaN patterns for safe workflow version migrations without access to the necessary API options.
proposedFix: Expose Upgrade-on-CaN option and ContinueAsNewSuggestedReasons in the Go SDK API surface
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and merged via the versioning/upgrade-on-can branch
keyQuote: This is needed for Trampolining / upgrade-on-CaN support
